channel.title: Comments on: New Book Review Landing Page!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Good point. I think I wrote it in light of the fact that some of the new ones I wrote are in the new format. To answer your question though, I am definitely going to modify that old ones in the near future. Got to keep great quality all around! =D
item.content:encoded: Good point. I think I wrote it in light of the fact that some of the new ones I wrote are in the new format. To answer your question though, I am definitely going to modify that old ones in the near future. Got to keep great quality all around! =D

item.title: By: Moboy78
item.dc:creator: Moboy78
item.description: I like the new book review page layout. Much easier to find book reviews with the new categories! However, I didn't see any reviews that had the new system you were going to use to review them. I might have been misinterpreting you earlier, but were you going to change existing book reviews, or just use that system for new ones?
item.content:encoded: I like the new book review page layout. Much easier to find book reviews with the new categories! However, I didn’t see any reviews that had the new system you were going to use to review them. I might have been misinterpreting you earlier, but were you going to change existing book reviews, or just use that system for new ones?
